sentences.en: Are you done with this magazine?
sentences.cn: 这本杂志你看完了吗？

sentences.en: Children at school receive coloured stars for work well done.
sentences.cn: 学校里的孩子表现得好会得到彩色星星。

sentences.en: Everyone is agreed that something needs to be done about the situation.
sentences.cn: 所有人一致认为需要采取措施改变这种局面。

sentences.en: Getting my work done! My God! As if it mattered.
sentences.cn: 把我的工作做完！老天！好像它真的很重要似的。

sentences.en: I feel it's done me good to get it off my chest.
sentences.cn: 我感觉吐吐苦水对我有好处。

sentences.en: I managed to get all the ironing done this morning.
sentences.cn: 我今天上午努力熨完了所有的衣服。

sentences.en: I'm not ever going to forget what you've done for the nippers.
sentences.cn: 我永远忘不了你为这些小孩子所做的一切。

sentences.en: I’ll be glad when the exams are over and done with (= completely finished ) .
sentences.cn: 等考试全部结束我就开心了。

sentences.en: if the guard sees us, we're done for.
sentences.cn: 如果警卫看到我们，就完了。

sentences.en: Immediately I've done it I feel completely disgusted with myself.
sentences.cn: 我一做完那件事就对自己感到十分厌恶。

sentences.en: It was hard to visualize how it could have been done.
sentences.cn: 很难想象这是如何办到的。

sentences.en: Most modern housing estates are terrible and inevitably done on the cheap.
sentences.cn: 现在的房子大多质量差劲透顶，肯定都是偷工减料盖起来的。

sentences.en: Other than blowing up a tyre I hadn't done any car maintenance.
sentences.cn: 除了给轮胎充气外，我没做过任何汽车保养。

sentences.en: She turned scarlet from embarrassment, once she realized what she had done.
sentences.cn: 她意识到自己做了什么后羞红了脸。

sentences.en: The job’s nearly done.
sentences.cn: 工作快做完了。

sentences.en: The police haven't really done anything for the black community in particular.
sentences.cn: 警方并未真正特意为黑人群体做什么.

sentences.en: They felt as though they had done something discreditable and unclean.
sentences.cn: 他们觉得自己仿佛做了什么龌龊丢脸之事。

sentences.en: They had done everything humanly possible for their son.
sentences.cn: 他们已经为儿子竭尽了全力。

sentences.en: This final part of the mixing is done slowly and delicately.
sentences.cn: 调和的最后一步要缓慢而精心。

sentences.en: you look done in.
sentences.cn: 你看起来已经筋疲力尽了。

sentences.en: you look done in.
sentences.cn: 你看起来已经筋疲力尽了。

words.tran_cn: 完成了；做好了的；煮熟的；合乎礼仪的

phrases.tran_cn: (美)一个完成了的计划（或项目）
本来能做成的（却没做成）
(非正式)累极了的；筋疲力尽的
必定做了…（表示对过去的推测）
过去将来完成时（可用于虚拟句，表示与过去的事实相反）；过去将来完成时（表示在过去某一时间对将来某一时刻以前所会发生的动作）

trans.tran_cn: 已完成的，煮熟的，合乎礼仪的，合乎规矩的
